casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Ricky Dean JOHNSON. No. 372P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Brandon L. Truman, Assistant Attorney General, Rick Shaffer, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of July 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
